Workflow.Name: HELPER - Add User to Security Role
Workflow.Description: Helper flow to add users to security roles. Currently supports adding AAD Groups to Security Roles in the main organization of the current environment. In other words, does not yet support adding users, adding to child business units, or adding to security roles in other environments.
Workflow.BillingContext: [{"id":"admin_CoESetupWizardPreview","type":"UnifiedApp","metadata":{"displayName":"CoE Setup and Upgrade Wizard"}},{"id":"admin_PowerPlatformAdminView","type":"UnifiedApp","metadata":{"displayName":"Power Platform Admin View"}}]

LocalizedName.description: HELPER - Add User to Security Role

Description.description: Helper flow to add users to security roles. Currently supports adding AAD Groups to Security Roles in the main organization of the current environment. In other words, does not yet support adding users, adding to child business units, or adding to security roles in other environments.
